segments.pli: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā … pe … ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
segments.en: Then several mendicants went up to the Buddha … and asked him,

segments.pli: “kīvabahukā nu kho, bhante, kappā abbhatītā atikkantā”ti?
‘ettakā kappā iti vā, ettakāni kappasatāni iti vā, ettakāni kappasahassāni iti vā, ettakāni kappasatasahassāni iti vā’”ti.
segments.en: how many eons have passed, how many hundreds or thousands or hundreds of thousands of eons.”
“But sir, is it possible to give a simile?”
“Suppose there were four disciples with a lifespan of a hundred years.

segments.pli: Te divase divase kappasatasahassaṃ kappasatasahassaṃ anussareyyuṃ.
segments.en: And each day they would each recollect a hundred thousand eons.

segments.pli: Ananussaritāva, bhikkhave, tehi kappā assu, atha kho te cattāro sāvakā vassasatāyukā vassasatajīvino vassasatassa accayena kālaṃ kareyyuṃ.
segments.en: Those four disciples would pass away after a hundred years and there would still be eons that they haven’t recollected.

segments.pli: Evaṃ bahukā kho, bhikkhave, kappā abbhatītā atikkantā.
segments.en: That’s how many eons have passed.

segments.pli: ‘ettakā kappā iti vā, ettakāni kappasatāni iti vā, ettakāni kappasahassāni iti vā, ettakāni kappasatasahassāni iti vā’ti.
segments.en: how many eons have passed, how many hundreds or thousands or hundreds of thousands of eons.
This is quite enough for you to become disillusioned, dispassionate, and freed regarding all conditions.”

suttaplex.blurb: Even recollecting 100,000 eons per day you’ll never remember the beginning of transmigration.
